requirement_tested: A homepage displaying featured technical articles and solutions
user_persona: A tech enthusiast visiting the site for the first time.
user_goal: To quickly find interesting technical content from the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the website and lands on the homepage. He sees two distinct sections: 'Featured Articles' and 'Popular Solutions'.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage renders with both 'Featured Articles' and 'Popular Solutions' sections, each showing a grid of cards.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Featured Content
narrative_steps.description: Alex hovers over an article card titled 'Understanding Quantum Computing' and notices it lifts slightly with a shadow effect.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the article card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card elevates and displays a subtle shadow effect.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Article Detail
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by the title, Alex clicks on the article card to read more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the article card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: User is redirected to the detailed view page for that specific article.

requirement_tested: A dedicated page for browsing technical articles with pagination or infinite scroll
user_persona: A developer looking for in-depth tutorials.
user_goal: To browse multiple technical articles efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Articles Page
narrative_steps.description: Jamie navigates to the articles browsing page to explore available content.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the articles listing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page loads with a vertical list of articles including titles, excerpts, authors, dates, and tags.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling Through Articles
narrative_steps.description: Jamie scrolls down the list of articles. As they near the bottom, more articles load automatically.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll towards the end of the article list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional articles are fetched and appended to the list without manual intervention.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Specific Article
narrative_steps.description: Jamie finds an article titled 'Building REST APIs with Node.js' and clicks on it to read further.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the article title.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed article view page for the selected article.

requirement_tested: A search functionality allowing users to query technical information across articles and solutions
user_persona: A systems administrator troubleshooting a server issue.
user_goal: To quickly locate relevant technical resources using keywords.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Taylor needs help resolving a Docker container error. They click into the search bar at the top of the site.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Input field gains focus and cursor blinks ready for typing.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Query
narrative_steps.description: Taylor types 'Docker container restart loop' into the search box.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Docker container restart loop' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text appears in the input field as typed.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search
narrative_steps.description: After typing the query, Taylor presses Enter to initiate the search.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System redirects to the search results page populated with matching articles and solutions.

requirement_tested: A detailed view page for each technical article with formatted content display
user_persona: A software engineer researching microservices architecture.
user_goal: To thoroughly understand complex architectural concepts presented in articles.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Detailed Article View
narrative_steps.description: Casey clicks on an article about 'Microservices Communication Patterns' from the search results.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the article link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article detail page loads displaying the full title, author, publish date, and formatted content area.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Formatted Content
narrative_steps.description: Casey scrolls through the article noticing well-formatted headings, bullet points, and code snippets.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll vertically through the article content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content scrolls smoothly with all formatting intact, including syntax-highlighted code blocks.

narrative_steps.title: Following External References
narrative_steps.description: While reading, Casey clicks on a reference link to an external documentation source.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an embedded hyperlink within the article.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Link opens in a new browser tab, keeping the article open in the original tab.

requirement_tested: A section for browsing and viewing solutions with filtering options by category or date
user_persona: An IT support specialist seeking proven fixes.
user_goal: To find categorized troubleshooting solutions efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Solutions Section
narrative_steps.description: Jordan goes to the solutions section to look up known fixes for network issues.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the solutions browsing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page displays a filter sidebar and a list of solution cards on the right side.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Category Filter
narrative_steps.description: Jordan selects 'Networking' from the category dropdown to narrow down the results.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Networking' from the category filter dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List updates dynamically to show only Networking-related solutions.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Solution Details
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on a solution titled 'Fixing Intermittent DNS Failures' to get detailed steps.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the solution card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed view page for the selected solution.

requirement_tested: A detailed view page for each solution with structured presentation of problem and resolution
user_persona: A DevOps engineer applying documented fixes.
user_goal: To accurately follow step-by-step instructions to resolve infrastructure problems.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Solution Detail
narrative_steps.description: Riley opens a solution page dealing with Kubernetes pod failures.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a specific solution's detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page loads with clearly separated 'Problem Description' and 'Resolution Steps' sections.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Problem Statement
narrative_steps.description: Riley reads through the problem description to confirm it matches their issue.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through the 'Problem Description' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Section displays the problem context with proper formatting and clarity.

narrative_steps.title: Executing Resolution Steps
narrative_steps.description: Riley follows the numbered resolution steps carefully to fix the issue.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through the 'Resolution Steps' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each step is clearly outlined and easy to follow for implementation.

requirement_tested: User authentication system supporting registration, login, and session management
user_persona: A new contributor wanting to share knowledge.
user_goal: To create an account and start participating in discussions.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Registration Process
narrative_steps.description: Morgan visits the site and decides to sign up to contribute articles. They click the Register button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Register' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Registration form modal or page appears with fields for username, email, and password.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Registration Info
narrative_steps.description: Morgan fills out the registration form with valid details and clicks Submit.
narrative_steps.action: Fill registration form and click 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form validates input and sends data to the backend; user receives confirmation and is redirected to the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out Later
narrative_steps.description: After exploring the site, Morgan logs out using the profile menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Logout' option from the user profile menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session ends, cookies are cleared, and Morgan is redirected back to the homepage as a guest.

requirement_tested: A user profile page showing authored articles, contributed solutions, and communication history
user_persona: An experienced writer reviewing their contributions.
user_goal: To review personal activity and contributions on the platform.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Pat logs in and navigates to their profile page to see their overall contribution stats.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the user profile page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profile page loads with default Overview tab showing summary statistics like number of articles and solutions.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Authored Articles
narrative_steps.description: Pat switches to the 'Authored Articles' tab to see a list of their published work.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Authored Articles' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tab content updates asynchronously to show a list of articles Pat has written.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Communication History
narrative_steps.description: Curious about past interactions, Pat checks the 'Communication History' tab.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Communication History' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays a chronological list of Pat's messages and comments without refreshing the entire page.

requirement_tested: A messaging or discussion feature enabling users to communicate with each other
user_goal: To discuss implementation strategies privately in real-time.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Messaging Interface
narrative_steps.description: Sam opens the messaging panel to talk to a fellow contributor named Lee.
narrative_steps.action: Open the messaging interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interface shows a list of existing conversations on the left and message threads on the right.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Conversation Thread
narrative_steps.description: Sam clicks on Lee’s name in the conversation list to continue their previous discussion.
narrative_steps.action: Click on Lee’s conversation entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message history with Lee loads in the main chat pane instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Real-Time Message
narrative_steps.description: Sam types a quick question about API rate limits and hits Enter to send it.
narrative_steps.action: Type message and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message appears immediately in the thread and is delivered in real-time to Lee.

requirement_tested: A commenting system on articles and solutions to allow user interaction
user_persona: A reader providing feedback on a tutorial.
user_goal: To give constructive feedback and ask clarifying questions.

narrative_steps.title: Reading and Preparing Comment
narrative_steps.description: Taylor finishes reading an informative article and scrolls to the comments section to leave thoughts.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the article where comments are displayed.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Comments section loads below the article showing existing user comments with avatars and timestamps.

narrative_steps.title: Writing a New Comment
narrative_steps.description: Taylor writes a helpful suggestion in the comment form provided.
narrative_steps.action: Enter text into the comment composition textarea.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Typed text appears in the textarea ready for submission.

narrative_steps.title: Posting the Comment
narrative_steps.description: After composing the comment, Taylor clicks the Post button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Post' button next to the comment form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Comment is added instantly to the list after successful API response, visible to all readers.

requirement_tested: Backend API endpoints for fetching articles, solutions, user data, and search results from a PostgreSQL database
user_persona: A frontend developer integrating dynamic content.
user_goal: To retrieve accurate data from backend services via API calls.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Articles Data
narrative_steps.description: During development, Kai makes an API request to fetch the latest articles for the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: Make GET request to '/api/articles'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server responds with JSON array containing article objects retrieved from PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Across Resources
narrative_steps.description: Kai tests the global search endpoint to verify cross-resource querying works.
narrative_steps.action: Make GET request to '/api/search?query=authentication&type=all'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns combined results of articles and solutions matching the keyword 'authentication'.

narrative_steps.title: Retrieving User Information
narrative_steps.description: Kai verifies that user-specific data can be fetched using the appropriate endpoint.
narrative_steps.action: Make GET request to '/api/users/123' with authentication token.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Receives detailed user object including authored content and communication history.

requirement_tested: Frontend components making HTTP requests to backend APIs for all dynamic data
user_goal: To view fresh, up-to-date content loaded dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Initial Load with Loading State
narrative_steps.description: When Maya visits the articles page, she initially sees a spinner indicating content is loading.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the articles listing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Spinner animation is shown until API response completes.

narrative_steps.title: Displaying Fetched Content
narrative_steps.description: Once the data arrives, the spinner disappears and articles populate the page.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for API response to complete.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Spinner vanishes and articles are rendered in place dynamically.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Dynamic Data
narrative_steps.description: Maya applies a filter which triggers another API call for refined results.
narrative_steps.action: Apply a category filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New API request is made, and the article list refreshes with filtered content without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: Environment configuration setup using specified PostgreSQL connection variables
user_goal: To ensure secure and stable database connectivity upon deployment.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Before starting the app, Dana ensures the correct database credentials are set in the environment config.
narrative_steps.action: Set environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Variables are stored securely in the .env file and accessible to the backend process.

narrative_steps.title: Initializing Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: On startup, the backend attempts to establish a connection pool using the configured settings.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend service.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Application successfully connects to PostgreSQL using the defined credentials and initializes connection pooling.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Operational Status
narrative_steps.description: Dana confirms that the database is actively serving requests through logging or monitoring tools.
narrative_steps.action: Check application logs for database connection success messages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Log entries confirm healthy database connection and readiness to serve API requests.

requirement_tested: Package scripts in `package.json`: `install:all` for installing frontend and backend dependencies, and `dev` for running both concurrently
user_persona: Full-stack developer setting up local environment.
user_goal: To easily install and launch both frontend and backend projects together.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies Simultaneously
narrative_steps.description: Ash clones the repo and runs a single command to install all project dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both client and server dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: After setup, Ash uses one command to start both frontend and backend development servers.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend development servers start simultaneously and run concurrently.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Service Availability
narrative_steps.description: Ash opens the browser to confirm that both services are responding correctly.
narrative_steps.action: Visit localhost ports for frontend and backend.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend UI loads successfully and backend APIs respond with valid data.

requirement_tested: Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
user_goal: To navigate and consume content comfortably on a smartphone.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Quinn opens the website on their phone to read an article during commute.
narrative_steps.action: Open site URL on a mobile device or resize browser to mobile width.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site layout adjusts responsively, navigation collapses into a hamburger menu, and fonts scale appropriately.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Responsive Elements
narrative_steps.description: Quinn taps the hamburger icon to access navigation links.
narrative_steps.action: Tap the hamburger menu icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation drawer slides in smoothly, presenting accessible menu items.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Content Comfortably
narrative_steps.description: Quinn scrolls through an article with appropriately sized text and touch-friendly spacing.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll and interact with article content on mobile screen.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content remains readable and interactive elements are large enough for comfortable tapping.
